description: This is the main Dart file for the Flutter frontend of a baby name finder app. It defines the HomeScreen widget which displays baby names in a staggered grid layout, utilizing state management via Provider to handle loading state and name data.

classes.name: HomeScreen
classes.description: A StatelessWidget that serves as the main screen for displaying baby names with a header and a grid view.

classes.name: _HomeScreenState
classes.description: The state class for HomeScreen, managing the initialization and building of the UI, including data loading and rendering.

methods.name: initState
methods.description: Initializes the state and triggers loading of baby names after the first frame.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the HomeScreen, including gradient background, header, and grid of names.

methods.name: _buildHeader
methods.description: Builds the header widget containing the title and subtitle.
